name: TorqueL
description: TorqueL is unique a 2D "rolling" & "extend" platformer/action/puzzle game. Including total 50 chambers, 7 basic routes. Music of product version created by sanodg(Nobuyoshi Sano).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 later Processor: 1.8GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 pixels DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: Recommended playing with Xbox 360 gamepad

reviews.review_text: This game just feels clunky and hard to work with.
